DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether addition Elotuzumab Lenalidomide/low-dose Dexamethasone increase progression free survival ( PFS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Phase III Study Lenalidomide Dexamethasone With Without Elotuzumab Treat Relapsed Refractory Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com . Best response achieve ≥Partial Response ( PR ) 2 . Patient refractory 3 . Patient discontinue due Grade ≥3 related adverse event 4 .
